scripts.rename-dmg: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const dmgDir = 'src-tauri/target/release/bundle/dmg'; if (fs.existsSync(dmgDir)) { const files = fs.readdirSync(dmgDir); const dmgFile = files.find(f => f.startsWith('FileFlow_') && f.endsWith('.dmg')); if (dmgFile) { fs.renameSync(path.join(dmgDir, dmgFile), path.join(dmgDir, 'FileFlow.dmg')); console.log('Renamed', dmgFile, 'to FileFlow.dmg'); } }"
